Address.label: Address
Address.value: 6110 STONERIDGE MALL ROAD, PLEASANTON, California, 94588, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Workday is a software company that offers human capital management, financial management, and business planning solutions. Known for being a cloud-only software provider, Workday is headquartered in Pleasanton, California. Founded in 2005, Workday now employs over 12,000 employees.
